title: Tarot Cards - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/24/22
itunes:title: Tarot Cards - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/24/22
description:
George Noory and psychologist Art Rosengarten explore his long career using tarot cards, the mental health applications of reading the cards, if pulling the death card is a bad omen, and how his intuition helps him make readings.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
